calculateDiscountOnCreditMemos.description: Specifies if the discount should be applied to payment term. True indicates a discount will be given, false indicates a discount will not be given.

code.description: The code of the payment term.

discountDateCalculation.description: Specifies the formula that is used to calculate the date that a payment must be made in order to obtain a discount.

displayName.description: Specifies the payment term's name. This name will appear on all sales documents for the payment term.

dueDateCalculation.description: Specifies the formula that is used to calculate the date that a payment must be made.

id.description: The unique ID of the payment term. Non-editable.

lastModifiedDateTime.description: The last datetime the payment term was modified. Read-Only.
